data.title: Aristocats Study Companion
data.meta_description: Aristocats Study Companion - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The film follows Duchess and her kittens who are abandoned in the countryside by Madame's jealous butler Edgar. They meet Thomas O'Malley who helps them try to return home. Meanwhile, Edgar hopes to inherit Madame's fortune by getting rid of the cats. The cats have several adventures on their journey back to Paris with the help of Thomas O'Malley and other animal friends.
